message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1000000 to you. I understand the importance and significance of this product to you, and I would like to extend an exclusive offer to make it accessible to you at a special price. My proposal is to offer you the product for $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate, considering its immense worth to you. I believe this offer will be mutually beneficial, allowing you to secure the product while also providing me with a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
